articles.description: Diners have been left outraged after L'Enclume in Cartmel, Cumbria (inset, Chef Patron Simon Rogan) hiked its taster menu to £250 after it was given a third Michelin star in February.
articles.content:
Diners have been left outraged after a restaurant hiked its taster menu to £250 after it became the first eaterie outside the South East to get a third Michelin star.
